1.新增表
create table hrm_position
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100) null
  comment '岗位名称',
  type        varchar(50)  null
  comment '类型',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table hrm_position_type
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100) null
  comment '名称',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);


-- auto-generated definition
create table contract_entity
(
  id          varchar(50)   not null
    primary key,
    code varchar(100),
  name        varchar(100)  null,
  profile varchar(200) null,
  bank varchar(100),
  bankaccount varchar(100),
  website varchar(100),
  addr varchar(100),
  bus varchar(100),
  mark        varchar(100)  null,
  dr          char          null,
  create_by   varchar(50)   null,
  update_by   varchar(50)   null,
  create_time datetime      null,
  update_time datetime      null
);

create table contract_entity_contacts
(
  id          varchar(50)   not null
    primary key,
    code varchar(100),
  entityid        varchar(50)  null,
  name varchar(100),
  sex varchar(100),
  mail varchar(100),
  mobile varchar(100),
  mark        varchar(100)  null,
  dr          char          null,
  create_by   varchar(50)   null,
  update_by   varchar(50)   null,
  create_time datetime      null,
  update_time datetime      null
);

create table contract
(
  id          varchar(50)    primary key,
  title varchar(100),
   about varchar(100),
  status varchar(50),
  type varchar(50),
  relation varchar(50),
  files varchar(500),
  effectivedate date,
  closingdate date,
  belongcom varchar(50),
  belongpart varchar(50),
  totalamount decimal(10,2),
  reviewer varchar(50),
  firstparty  varchar(50),
  secondparty  varchar(50),
  relatedparty varchar(500),
  direction varchar(50),
  mark        varchar(100)  null,
  dr          char          null,
  create_by   varchar(50)   null,
  update_by   varchar(50)   null,
  create_time datetime      null,
  update_time datetime      null
);


INSERT INTO sys_dict (`dict_id`, `name`, `dict_level`, `status`, `dr`, `mark`, `create_time`, `create_by`, `update_time`, `update_by`) VALUES ('zcdoctype', '资产_文档类型', 'system', 'Y', '0', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL')
INSERT INTO sys_dict_item(`dict_id`, `dict_item_id`, `name`, `sort`, `mark`, `code`, `create_time`, `create_by`, `update_time`, `update_by`, `dr`) VALUES ('zcdoctype', '1301760499058262018', '其他文档', 3, '3', '3', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', '0')
